shortdesc.ph: Reports the statistics of the audio stream from each remote user/host.
Reports the statistics of the audio stream from each remote user/host.

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback once every two seconds. The SDK triggers this callback once every two seconds. If a channel includes multiple remote users, the SDK triggers this callback as many times. If a channel includes multiple remote users, the SDK triggers this callback as many times.

plentry.pd: The statistics of the received remote audio streams. See . The statistics of the received remote audio streams. See .
